Doesn't anyone have a version where the audio is in sync?

For those of you having problems with Audio sync. Open the file with VLC media player, and then go to 
Tools -> Track Synchronization -> Advance of audio over video. change the value of it to MINUS - 0.300s and then you will have audio and video in sync.
